about_the_game:
30 Days in red army is in early access - during development we will add more events, minigames, alternative endings, achievements and statistics.

Studio Eny Project does not support the war and is against any suffering that the war or any "special military operation" can bring. As the result of this attitude, we would like to present you a simple text RPG game about soldier life in the red army.

The game does not aim to alleviate the violence and suffering of people affected by the war, but, on the contrary, to ridicule those who unnecessarily prolong its duration.

So do not hesitate to try to survive 30 days in red army against tough enemy resistance and all odds caused by incompetence of the red army.

30 Days in red army is in early access - during development we will add more events, minigames, alternative endings, achievements and statistics.

Studio Eny Project does not support the war and is against any suffering that the war or any "special military operation" can bring. As the result of this attitude, we would like to present you a simple text RPG game about soldier life in the red army.

The game does not aim to alleviate the violence and suffering of people affected by the war, but, on the contrary, to ridicule those who unnecessarily prolong its duration.

name: 30 days in red army

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hello guys, Eny Project Studio presents our first PC game. 30 Days in red army is a simple text RPG with pixelated graphic and randomized events and results. Game was created to reflect our attitude against war activities by you know who and his incompetent army.
